metadata.title: keenylog - AI Pet Health Management
metadata.description: From AI food analysis to health checks and walk tracking. Manage your pet's healthy life with keenylog.

hero.title:
Your Pet's
Healthy Daily Life
hero.subtitle:
From AI food analysis to health checks and walk tracking.
Everything you need for your pet's health in one place.

features.sectionSubtitle: Your AI-powered partner that analyzes, records, and grows together with your pet

food_analysis.title: AI Food Analysis
food_analysis.description: Just one photo of pet food and AI automatically analyzes calories, nutrients, ingredients, and quality rating.

stool_check.title: AI Health Check
stool_check.description: Get health scores, color & consistency analysis, urgency assessment, and health advice from a stool photo.

walk_tracking.title: Walk & Exercise Tracking
walk_tracking.description: Track daily walks with GPS route tracking, step counting, and distance measurement.

weight_management.title: Weight Management
weight_management.description: Record daily weight and visualize health changes at a glance with trend charts.

grooming_vet.title: Grooming & Vet Records
grooming_vet.description: Systematically manage grooming schedules and vet visit records with photos.

gamification.title: Missions & Rewards
gamification.description: Complete daily and weekly missions to earn EXP and points, and level up your pet.

aiShowcase.sectionSubtitle: Google Gemini AI precisely analyzes your pet's meals and health status

food.title: AI Food Analysis
food.description: Take a photo of food or treats, and AI instantly analyzes food type, calories, nutrients, and quality rating.

stool.title: AI Health Check
stool.description: Get a health score (1-10), color & consistency analysis, and urgency assessment from a stool photo.

gamification.sectionSubtitle: Complete missions, earn rewards, and level up together with your pet

community.sectionSubtitle: AI writes diaries from your pet's perspective
community.diary_description: AI writes daily diaries from your pet's point of view

community.sample_diary2: Tried a new treat and it was delicious! Gotta ask for more next time üòã
community.sample_diary3: Weighed myself today and I'm lighter than last week. Must be the walks! üí™

download.sectionSubtitle:
Create a healthy daily routine for your pet with keenylog.
Download for free and receive 1,000 welcome points!
